Description:
YOUR FRIENDS & FAMILY WILL BE ENVIOUS
This grand & luxurious 4 BR display home is ready for someone to call it home. Offering an endless list of quality fittings & fixtures throughout, the designer built kitchen with butlers pantry, double wall ovens & all the extras you need to entertain is a WOW! You can overlook all the family enjoying the large alfresco area with BBQ & wood fire pizza oven as well as 3 hole putting green, or simply relax inside in one of the 3 living areas - one being a theatre room Upstairs you will appreciate all the large BRs & knowing through summer you have Dual Zone, dual thermostat ducted heating & air cond. In one of Clyde's finest boulevards, close to all facilities & a host of outstanding schools this is the exclusive estate to reside in.

Description:
LOADS OF ROOM INSIDE & OUT WITH EXTRAS APLENTY!
Renovated 5 bedroom lifestyle home, versatile land suiting home business, livestock & horses. All offers in the vicinity of the asking price are to be considered by the Vendor. Don't miss your opportunity to secure this fantastic residence!
Situated in the sought after township of Clyde, on a sealed road and 1.5 acre (approx.) allotment, this charming character filled home will blow you away with the size both inside & out, the best of indoor/outdoor living and a "one of a kind" geo-thermal ducted heating & cooling system valued in excess of $70,000 RRP and running at a fraction of the cost of conventional systems which is fast becoming the preferred future option in the residential & commercial industries Australia wide!
The home itself has added features of 5 huge bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 toilets, 2 huge living areas all set on polished timber flooring & open plan living! There are also 2 set wood fire heaters, stainless steel kitchen appliances with gas cooking, island bench top and loads of bench & cupboard space!
Outside features include in ground gas heated pool, double car port, multiple verandah outdoor living areas, multiple shedding housing more than 4 cars in total, with power and concrete base to the larger of the 2. Combined capacity across 2 water tanks in excess of 17,000 litres & gas hot water! Fully fenced paddocks and picturesque surroundings, this versatile home will cater for home business, families of different sizes and those looking for extra space inside & out!
Located within a small radius to all amenities but still private enough to enjoy the rural lifestyle take advantage of the best of indoor & outdoor living and book your inspection today before this property is snapped up!
CALL NOW!
Insights: 300 Manks Road, CLYDE VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT BY PAUL RINGERI**
CLYDE (115703263): If you have been looking for a tree change, a place where you can simply move in, unpack and relax with nothing to do then I suggest you add 1410 Ballarto Road to your inspection list!
Surrounded by well manicured landscaped gardens and sprawling neighbouring acreage this is a true lifestyle property in every sense of the word. Ideally suited to growing families and those downsizing from larger property there is plenty of room for the horses to roam around and enough space for the kids to ride the 4-wheeler!
Loved and cared for over the years the current owners have left no stone unturned in creating one of most appealing properties within this private township.
The home itself is ranch style in design and is full of character and charm. Offering 3 spacious robed bedrooms plus an enclosed study with double doors. The master suite provides a ceiling fan, bonus robe space plus a FES with 1.5 shower. Bedrooms 2 and 3 are in close proximity to the family toilet and bathroom with separate shower and corner spa bath. The enclosed study can easily be utilised as a 4th bedroom.
The hostess timber kitchen is a chef's dream! With a picturesque outlook there is an abundance of cupboard/bench space and appliances including a wall oven, rangehood, dishwasher and 4-burner hot plate. All this plus a whole lot more including the wide fridge cavity and a microwave provision overlooking the separate meals area with convenient external sliding door access.
There are 3 separate living zones catering for all forms of entertaining. Upon entry you will be greeted by a formal lounge with bay window which, given that it can be enclosed using the sliding door and feature bi-fold door, would make the ideal home theatre room. The separate family area is complete with a visually impacting timber lined vaulted ceiling plus a brick feature wall and gas converted Coonara. The oversized tiled rumpus/games room offers feature lighting, RC/SS air-conditioning, built in wall unit plus a hostess bar offering hot/cold water facilities. This is the perfect place for the pool table and darts board. Given that it can be shut off from the main residence and has separate side access it can easily double up as the perfect office for running a home based business (S.T.C.A.).
Added internal extras include a private entry, Tasmanian Oak timber flooring, walk in linen storage, laundry with ironing bench facilities plus a state of the art monitored alarm system (house and garage can be activated separately). Don't forget the cornice work, federation colours, downlights, feature walls, quality blinds, near new evaporative cooling, ducted heating plus ducted vacuuming.
Step outside and be greeted by a sweeping driveway with a 360 degree turning circle. Picturesque landscaping creates the perfect street scape whilst the private front yard is easily distinguished from the oversized front fenced paddock. Kick back and enjoy the vista views from the extensive under-roofline verandah. There is a second fenced paddock at the rear plus a spacious back yard which is also aesthetically pleasing given the natural rural landscape.
If you like outdoor entertaining then your wish is my command! Relax with a glass of your finest whilst enjoying a family BBQ under the decked pergola. Measuring app. 7m x 11m and complete with a ceiling fan this is the place to be during the Summer months!
If you require substantial garage, parking and storage space then you are bound to have all of your boxes ticked. There is a concreted bay with sufficient space for app. 7 large vehicles and a huge concreted shed with power, lighting and side walkway access. Measuring app. 18m X 8m X 4.2m with remote roller door there is comfortable undercover parking for 6 cars. Don't forget the rear shed, more suited for storage, measuring app. 7m x 6m.
Bonus external features include an enclosed dog pen and colourbond roofing!
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde, Junction Village and Cranbourne. This dream property is also only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, the newly constructed Casey Fields football ground and aquatic centre, the Royal Botanic Gardens and the Cranbourne Race Track.
If you want your family to have the very best in country living within minutes to all of the amenities associated with city living including entertainment, education and recreation then enquire today before it's SELLING .. SELLING ... SOLD!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and the vendor's expectations. You can view with confidence that vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.

Description:
UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT!
CLYDE PASADENA ESTATE Searching for a tranquil location? Requiring an estate offering family friendly living? Wanting to be within a brief drive to major shopping facilities and freeway access? This is definitely affordable buying for first timers so take advantage of the Government Grants on offer and buy with confidence today!
Titled and ready to build on this spacious allotment is truly a prime piece of real estate and provides the perfect foundation to create your dream home whilst enjoying the quality lifestyle on offer in Pasadena! This premium parcel measures app. 511m2 and with a frontage of app. 16m and a depth of app. 32m the land itself is relatively level and regular in shape and provides ample room for an array of designs.
Created by well known developers Villawood, Pasadena Clyde is designed around open outdoor areas creating an innovative, greener lifestyle. A uniquely planned community this terrific estate will cater to your every need. You will have no trouble in creating the perfect work-life balance with the extensive parkland, multiple playgrounds catering for all children's ages, interconnected walking/bike tracks and sporting grounds!
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne this block is also only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, the newly constructed Casey Fields football ground and aquatic centre.
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation call today before it's GOING, GOING ..... GONE!
CONTACT US TO ARRANGE FOR A TIME TO VIEW THE SECTION 32 VENDOR STATEMENT!

Description:
WONDERFUL FAMILY LIFESTYLE ON 3 ACRES
(213290)Located on the very quiet Bakers Road you will find this beautiful 3 acre lifestyle property well setup for quality family living in mind, and with plenty of room for the horses and to kick the footy around.
With various features such as;
- Zoned UGB, great for future development STCA.
- Country style 3 bedroom brick veneer home with timber floors throughout.
- All bedrooms with BIR's.
- Large family room with coonara.
- Separate Dining & rumpus/formal dining.
- 250m training track with loose box & holding yards inside.
- Stable block consisting of 6 Stables & tack area.
- Picturesque courtyard with undercover BBQ area, great for entertaining.
This property is sure to impress and is well suited for someone with horses, dogs or just wanting that semi-rural lifestyle. An inspection is a must, but be quick as it won't be for sale long!!
For all enquiries & inspections please Call Jason Brown Direct.
Jason Brown : 0423 768 424

There's no better place to start your lifestyle living from with a home that needs no work. The home also features a new modern bathroom, floorboards, tiles and carpet throughout the living areas.

Description:
Endless opportunities on almost a 1/3 Acre
This is an amazing opportunity to secure an impressive investment in the future. Located in the tightly held township of Clyde where an old fashioned sense of space and a real feel of community still exist. With a huge amount of parkland across the road for the kids to stretch their legs chasing the dog or playing a spot of footy, and all just a short walk to the general store and primary school, life cant get much better than this! The home itself has a great family orientated layout with multiple living zones downstairs and an open light filled kitchen with loads of cupboard and bench space. The upstairs sleeping accommodation consists of three generous sized bedrooms with the master featuring ensuite and a further bathroom to cater to the balance of the bedrooms. The home is the perfect home to revitalize or redesign with endless possibilities for extensions or to put your own stamp on it. Outdoors, the options just continue to expand with an external self-contained single bedroom cottage and a good sized shed that makes for a multitude of uses. Thinking about all this its not just an investment in the future but a great lifestyle for today....
David Wereszczuk : 0407 657 455

Description:
SOLD BY THOMAS ALOYSIUS.
SELANDRA RISE: If you have been considering a change in scenery, move to a friendly estate providing the perfect atmosphere to raise children, peace and tranquillity, then I suggest you should look no further than SELANDRA RISE ESTATE!
This home constructed by multi award winning builders CARLISLE is full of class and sophistication and is sure to tick the boxes of even the most fastidious of purchasers!
Leaving no stone unturned the current vendors have designed the perfect floor plan to suit large families or growing families and also those wanting extra privacy and space!
Measuring app. 43 squares under-roofline with a wide entrance which is quite grand, this custom property comes with 6 star energy rating, providing 5 oversized bedrooms, a study and 4 toilets for your convenience. All the bedrooms are extra spacious, the property has a unique feature of option of having your master either on the ground floor or on the first floor because it comes with two master bedrooms, one on ground floor and other on the first, both with walk in robes and full en-suites. The spacious balcony on the master bedroom lets you enjoy the mountain view with a cup of coffee every single day.
The other 3 bedrooms with built in robes are really appealing to anyone who wants a place of their own.
The hostess kitchen is a chef's dream and is the central hub of the property. There is an endless list of extras, they include stone bench tops, glass splash back and walk in pantry, 900mm oven with 5-burner gas cooking whilst other appliances include the 900mm rangehood , built in microwave and a dishwasher. All this plus a whole lot more overlooking the spacious tiled meals zone with external sliding door access leading to the low maintenance yard and an awesome alfresco area.
Like to entertain? Your wish is my command! Take advantage of the spacious rumpus/home theatre room . There is enough space for the pool table/bar or the theatre seats/projector so the choice is yours! The tiled family area is very open and spacious comfortably catering for day to day living whilst the study room would also make the ideal home office nook or a gym!
Added internal bonuses include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, down lights, raised ceilings, neutral tones throughout , a convenient blend of quality carpets/tiling throughout. Not to mention the top end curtains/drapes and blinds, contemporary door upon entry, alarm system securing all external doors/windows and the family bathroom with separate bath/shower facilities, stone benchtop etc. The huge laundry with massive linen closet and the solar hot water with gas booster back up puts the icing on the cake!
Step outside and be greeted by the most sensational alfresco area ideal for your outdoor BBQ kitchen with outdoor gas point for BBQ. The good sized alfresco has 3 sliding doors from the living area and 2.5 sliding door from the theatre room which makes it ideal for large parties.
External features include, colour bond fencing, exposed aggregate driveway, porched entry , feature external lighting, basic landscaping allowing you to enhance it with your own style and flare. This property is walking distance to schools, parks and the upcoming brand new shopping centre.
The best way to enjoy the grandeur scale of this property is to pay it a visit in person.
Selandra Rise is located only short drive from freeway access and all amenities located in the town ships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne. Only minutes away are the popular Clyde Primary School and Cranbourne East St Peter's College campus, plus the newly constructed Casey Fields football ground and aquatic centre. It also boasts its own community place, which provides residents with sustainability information, access to health and well being activities.
This property is centrally located in the estate only few minutes walk to the park, school, future bus stop and shopping centre.
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*

Description:
PERFECT LOCATION ON 3 ACRES.
This home is located in a position where you will be hidden away surrounded by large farms and ideal for the owner wanting privacy and fresh air. Situated within a short distance to majors highways, freeways and shopping centres.
Featuring: 4 spacious bedrooms with WIR and ensuite in the main bedroom, Open plan living, family and dining area with contemporary kitchen, Large machinery shed (15 foot high, 20 foot wide, 34 foot long) and 3 phase power, Fully fenced, 4 car garage ideal for Caravan or Boat, Large deck in the outdoor area, 5kw solar system with two inverters and Refrigerated cooling.
To all tradies, stop and have a look at this stunner, this is a must see, it is ideal to run your own business from and has the perfect shedding for it.
PLEASE CALL MY MOBILE TO BOOK YOUR OWN PRIVATE VIEWING.

Description:
Great Area, Great Property... What A Price!!
(213090) Set on 3 Acres this 4 bedroom brick veneer home is designed for family living with a country flair in mind offers an open plan timber kitchen with stacks of cupboards & bench space and all your mod cons, 4 generous bedrooms, very appealing 3 zoned living which are the formal lounge, comfortable family room & dining which is the hub of the home, and then step down into the rumpus. Take a step outside to the undercover BBQ area, complimenting this area is the nicely maintained courtyard. If you need plenty of room for your boat/caravan/trucks and toys there is plenty of shedding on offer, a
4 car garage, work shop, high clearance machinery shed which is east facing so it can also be used as an area for the animals, and a barn with 2 stables & plenty of room for more, 4 holding bays all with concrete swilled flooring. With 4 good size paddocks with plenty of feed and good fencing, this property would be well suited for the sheep, ponies & horses. For a chance to inspect this delightful Hobby Farm with abundance of character and quality living located in the well sought after suburb of 'Clyde', For any inspections, please call Jason Brown directly.
Jason Brown : 0423 768 424

Description:
AFFORDABLE DREAM ON 3.8 ACRES
This is a country life style approx. 6.8 klm from the main street shopping centre of Cranbourne with a choice of schools, public transport ,pool & sporting complexes .Set at the end of a quiet court , this family home has 5 bedrooms , master is oversized with BIR & full ensuit. The heart of the home is a open plan kitchen with walk in pantry. 2 huge living areas with coonara wood heating , split system air con provides plenty of space for the whole family. Polished timber floors through out gives you that warm country feel. There is a large entertaining area under roof to suit summer BBQs & chill out living.
Out side
We have 3 paddocks with water from their own bore . 2 double garages with concrete floors, large bird Avery , storage sheds plus 20 established fruit trees , plum ,cherry ,pear ,apple, quince ,date ,lemon, etc : Don't delay call Bob Kay
Property Code: 2483

Description:
75 Acres, 10 minutes from Berwick
Excellent chance to acquire a substantial acreage only minutes from all facilities.
Many improvements including 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home, massive Hay Shed ,machinery shed and workshop, recently built windmill driven bore with PVC casing, water to all paddocks with centre lane way, cattle race and loading site, sandy soil to rear raised paddocks, and balance black peat soil creating good pasture.
Electricity and Telco on line, massive tank water .
An ideal investment with GAA rezoned land close by.
This may be next!

YOU COULD NOT BUILD FOR THIS MUCH!
Don't go through the stress and pain of building when you can have it right here, right now. A superbly built 3 plus study Carlisle Home has ticks in all the right boxes, and added extras that would cost you thousands to include yourself. Featuring gas ducted heating, air conditioning, remote garage, ceasar stone bench tops, under roofline alfresco area, quality tiles, impressive 900m stainless steel cooktop and oven are just some of the things you will love. All ready for you to make the final touches to the property by adding a garden of your choice. Perfectly maintained and with a free flowing floor plan and just as new, save the stress and look at this home today!!

Address: Lot 609 Hill Farm Drive Clyde VIC 3978
Description:
*** SOLD by Robert Petelinek AgentX Real Estate Berwick *** Massive 657m2 Block!
An opportunity has opened up in the Pasadena Estate Clyde that will allow you to build your dream home.
A very wide 18m frontage, you open yourself up to a selection of many homes for your choice of living.
All within Villawood's premier residential community, 'Pasadena', is set across beautifully undulating land in the heart of Clyde, just 50 minutes south east of Melbourne. Presenting a new lifestyle opportunity for Clyde, Pasadena comprises a variety of home sites and will offer its residents scenic views complemented by beautiful on-site parks.
An ideal home for young couples, growing families and those looking to downsize, Pasadena will include a series of walking tracks and community spaces for residents to enjoy.
Well positioned to benefit from nearby public transport, shopping and a range of educational and sporting facilities, Pasadena will be a place residents will be proud to call home.
We expect title on this block approx. Setember 2012

Description:
WHAT A FIND
Opposite Clyde Primary School, just a short stroll to Clyde General store and parks rests this unique three bedroom home. You will be impressed from start to finish with features such as cathedral ceilings, built in robes and vanity to the master bedroom, new fencing with double gates big enough to get the trailer, boat or caravan into the huge secure yard.
The kitchen is set in an ideal position with direct view to the landscaped yard.
With evaporative cooling, fireplace, wall furnace and air conditioner this home will feel cosy and comfortable all year round. Also featuring double car garage and u-shaped driveway, all set on approximately 680sqm of land.
Adrian Porto : 0422 263 198

Description:
20 ACRES WITH POTENTIAL
20 acres within the Urban Growth Boundary this property operated as a winery/restaurant until recently. Approx 10 acres of grapes, a three bedroom residence plus a purpose built cellar door style restaurant or function room. Some works are required but the basic structure is there. The grapes are a mix of varieties established for a number of years. The residence is ranch style with three bedrooms, a main L shaped lounge dining room with solid fuel heater plus kitchen and amenities. A rear pergola is next to a fenced inground swimming pool and cabana.
The "cellar" has a large well equipped servery with an open plan ground floor leading to a mezzanine and also to a raised covered timber deck overlooking the vines.
Add long term subdivision potential this property offers many options. Utilise the structure as winery, redevelop as a horse property. Create your own business and or lifestyle.
For further information or an opportunity to inspect, ring now.
Ross Neilson : 0418 331 696
